original: OHLSSON, Malte, Bankdirektör, Hässleholm, f N Åkarp, Krst l, 5/4 93 av Ola Johansson o Kristina Bengtsson, gm Ruth Håkansson. Folksk, självstud. Anst ss skogs- o sågvks-förm 27—32, dir Hshlm kred.frn fr 32, v. dir o deläg Hshlm torvströfabr M Ohlsson & C:o, v. dir Fastigh.AB Kornet, inneh Hshlm kol-& vedaff. V. styr.ordf Hshlm kred.frn, styr.led Hshlm hantv- & ind.frn, Nordskå hem-bygdsfrn, styr.suppl Sv kred.frn :rs samman-slutn, rev Tidn.AB N Skåne. Fd led dräts.kamm, led lönenmd, nmdem V Göinge hds-rätt. Resor: Tyskl 21, 36, Norge 37, Danm ett 20-t ggr. SiriusO (VIII).
translated: OHLSSON, Malte, Bank Director, Hässleholm, born in Åkarp, Baptized 5/4 1893, son of Ola Johansson and Kristina Bengtsson, married to Ruth Håkansson. Primary school education, self-study. Employed in forestry and sawmill management from 1927 to 1932, then became director of Hässleholm credit association from 1932, also vice director and co-owner of Hässleholm peat straw factory M Ohlsson & Co., vice director of Real Estate AB Kornet, owner of Hässleholm coal and firewood business. Vice chairman of Hässleholm credit association, board member of Hässleholm trade and industry association, Nordskå (North Scania) local heritage association, member of the board of Swedish credit union federation. Former member of the finance committee, member of the salary committee, lay judge at Västra Göinge district court. Travel: Germany 1921, 1936, Norway 1937, Denmark around 20 times. Awarded the Sirius medal (eighth class).
